amendment.description: To allocate additional funds for certain federal homeland security programs.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 494 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 119.
Amendment SA 494 proposed by Senator Breaux. (consideration: CR S4764-4769, S4776-4777; text: CR S4764-4765) To allocate additional funds for certain federal homeland security programs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 494 proposed by Senator Breaux.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 494 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 119.
